messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Barenaked Family... Nightline Show
messages.msgSnippet: I think what they are doing is great!  We traveled the country one summer and had a blast.  Then we bought land and horses and now we only take little
messages.messageBody:
I think what they are doing is great! We traveled the country one summer and had a blast. Then we bought land and horses and now we only take little getaway's to see snow. My spouse has talked about living on a sailboat, but the kids said only if it comes with acreage and horses. RVing is a fun way to travel, though, we have good memories. I recommend everyone try it at least for a few weeks.


----- Original Message ----
From: Lesa <lesajm@...>
To: Always Learning <AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com>; Crunchy Springfield <Crunchy_Springfield@yahoogroups.com>; RCU Yahoo Group <RadChristianUnschoolers@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Monday, October 16, 2006 1:05:46 PM
Subject: [AlwaysLearning] Barenaked Family... Nightline Show

If you missed seeing the traveling unschoolers on Nightline a few nights ago
you can see it all on the family's MySpace site. http://tinyurl. com/vrdoy

Lesa
http://lifeacademy. homeschooljourna l.net
http://stores. ebay.com/ qtpiecraftsthing s
